ygData.subject: Re: re: Duster Models
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I dropped 10 pounds of food in it, and saw no reduction.  I ll try something heavier. ... Exactly! Joe D
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Dec 15, 1999 at 04:24:27PM -0800, Eric Kenslow wrote:
> From: "Eric Kenslow" <eric@...>
>
> In reality, the bootstrutter pack IS weight reducing, by 10% as someone
> earlier posted. If you put something heavy like a two handed sword in it,
> you'll see that it drops a pound or two.

I dropped 10 pounds of food in it, and saw no reduction. I'll try something
heavier.

> Also, the gnomish glow rods are just light sources, but they look pretty
> darn spiffy (like a glowing reddish candle). Besides, it has 'gnomish' in
> the name of it, so we should all carry one with pride. ;)

Exactly!

Joe D
